reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121.
This course is open to non-Forestry students who meet the prerequisites.
Lab is held in CAWP Computer Lab (FSC 2942)
courseName: Quantitative Methods in the Wood Industry
description: Solving practical problems in the wood industry using computer-based mathematical tools including spreadsheets, visual basic programming and relational database systems.
